title: Golden Water — Gold Water Tracker iframe page + route + navigation

requirements.summary: Add a new “Gold Water Tracker” page that embeds the full Quench Joy Flow site in a responsive iframe without breaking the app layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to the new page shows an iframe rendering https://quench-joy-flow.lovable.app/ (full site, not a partial section).
The embedded site is usable on common viewport sizes (mobile and desktop) without horizontal overflow in the parent app.
The iframe includes an accessible title and does not break the surrounding app layout (header/footer remain visible).

file_operations.description: Create the Gold Water Tracker page with a responsive, full-width iframe pointed at https://quench-joy-flow.lovable.app/. Ensure the iframe has an accessible title, uses sizing that works on mobile/desktop (no parent horizontal overflow), and is contained so the existing AppLayout header/footer remain visible.

requirements.summary: Register a stable, lazy-loaded TanStack Router route for the Gold Water Tracker page.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting the route path directly loads the Gold Water Tracker page via the existing router (no blank screen / no 404).
The new route is lazy-loaded consistently with other non-landing pages.

file_operations.description: Add a lazy import for GoldWaterTrackerPage, create a new route at a stable path (e.g., "/gold-water-tracker"), and include it in the route tree alongside existing lazy-loaded pages.

requirements.summary: Expose navigation links to the Gold Water Tracker page in both desktop header navigation and the mobile menu.
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop navigation includes a link labeled "Gold Water Tracker" that navigates to the new route.
Mobile navigation includes a link labeled "Gold Water Tracker" that navigates to the new route and closes the mobile sheet.
All user-facing labels added for this feature are in English.

file_operations.description: Add a desktop header nav Link labeled "Gold Water Tracker" pointing to the new route, ensuring the label is in English and is available from the main navigation.
Add a mobile menu Link labeled "Gold Water Tracker" pointing to the new route, wired to call onClose so the mobile sheet closes after navigation; ensure the label is in English.
